description.value: The Essentials Mens Tee has a classic, traditional straight fit and true-to-size measurements. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, single and twin needle top stitching, plus a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings are finished with a twin needle stitch hem. The garment is made from a regular-weight single jersey constructed from 100% organic cotton, with a soft hand feel. Sizes run from XS to 3XL in five colours.

The Essentials Mens Regular Sweatshirt is a heritage-inspired piece with consistent true-to-size fit. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, and double shell 'half moon detail on the inside neck. The garment is finished with ribbing at the neck, hem and and cuffs. Its constructed from a mid-weight brushed fleece made from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester, with a soft hand feel and classic drape. Sizes range from XS to 3XL.

The Essentials Mens Long Sleeve Tee stays true to its iconic roots, with a classic fit and fabric weight. The Tee features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, single and twin needle top stitching, plus a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings are ribbed, with a twin needle stitch hem. Made from soft, regular-weight 100% organic cotton with focus on functional detailing. Available in XS to 3XL in five colours.

The Essentials Mens Regular Hoodie has a timeless, traditional cut, with kangaroo pocket and true-to-size measurements. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape. The hood is double shell with an inside neck 'half moon' detail for structure, and pulls tight with drawstrings and colour matched recycled sugarcane aglets. The Kangaroo pocket is single and twin needle stitched, and the garment is finished with ribbing at the hem and and cuffs. Its made from mid-weight brushed fleece constructed from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester, with a soft hand feel and classic drape. Sizes run from XS to 3XL in five colours.

The Essentials Womens Regular Tee brings a timeless, clean and super wearable silhouette in six colourways and sizing from XS to XL. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, single and twin needle top stitching, plus a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings are finished with a twin needle stitch hem. The Tee is made from soft, regular-weight, 100% organic cotton.

The Essentials Womens Regular Hoodie has a medium weight construction in soft, drapey, brushed fleece made from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape. The hood is double shell with an inside neck 'half moon' detail for structure, and pulls tight with drawstrings and colour matched recycled sugarcane aglets. The Kangaroo pocket is single and twin needle stitched, and the garment is finished with ribbing at the hem and and cuffs. Sizing runs from XS-XL.

The Womens Regular Long Sleeve Tee, in soft regular-weight 100% organic cotton, honours the timeless long sleeve heritage aesthetic. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, single and twin needle top stitching, plus a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings and hem are finished with a twin needle stitch. Sizes run from XS to XL in three colours.

The Essentials Womens Regular Sweatshirt boasts a crisp, drapey silhouette. It's crafted from a medium weight brushed fleece constructed from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester. It features a chain stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, and double shell 'half moon' detail on the inside neck. The garment is finished with ribbing at the crewneck, hem and and cuffs. Five colourways with sizing from XS-XL.

A Kids Tee with a classic cut, in soft, regular-weight 100% organic cotton. It features a chain-stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, single and twin-needle top stitching, plus  a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings are finished with a twin needle stitch hem. True-to-size fits to suit kids from toddler age up to teenagers, in four colours.

A Kids Sweatshirt with a timeless fit, in medium weight brushed fleece made from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester. It features a chain-stitched, felled shoulder seam with inside neck tape, and double shell 'half moon detail on the inside neck. The garment is finished with ribbing at the neck, hem and and cuffs. True-to-size fits to suit kids from toddler age up to teenagers, with three colours to select from.

A Baby Tee in soft, regular-weight 100% organic cotton with two shoulder press studs for ease of use. The little Tee features inside neck tape (only on the rear), single and twin needle top stitching, plus a single needle stitch around the neck. Sleeve endings and hem are finished with a twin needle stitch. Three sizes in four versatile colours.

A Baby Bodysuit made from soft, regular-weight 100% organic cotton. It features three poppers on the crotch, ribbed leg opening for comfort, and a hidden popper at the neck, which is also ribbed. Available in two colours and three sizes.

A classic 8 liter, unlined tote bag with two handles in cotton canvas. The bag is open at the top, with twin-needle topstitch, single needle topstitch, reinforcement stitching plus durable bartacking at the handles.

This large, 24 liter tote has a shaped bottom panel and two handles in cotton canvas. It is unlined, open at top and has an inside pocket with metal press button closure. Other highlights are its twin-needle topstitch, single needle topstitch, felled sideseam, reinforcement stitching and durable bartack at its handles.
Low profile six panel cap with adjustable buckle strap. The cap has a hard brim, metal buckle, plus single needle topstitch and stitched eyelets.
A classic baseball cap with a six panel design and velcro size adjustment. It features a hard brim, single needle topstitch and stitched eyelets. The cap has a ridged hand feel.
